bio.name: Leo Guillon
bio.role: UX Designer at Blache Yong & Co and Design Engineer for my side projects.
bio.description: I design interfaces, build tools, and document what I learn along the way. I care about craft and simplicity, and I like making things that feel good to use.
bio.history: Previously, I worked at Tymate (agency) and Dilypse (startup). You can find me on LinkedIn, Substack, or check out my work on GitHub.
